channel.title: Automation Layered Over Scene
channel.description:
Automation over the designated instrument’s section in the scene. ![image|128x185](upload://igZTSTL5UdvtwyDnonaUnYUslH4.jpeg) Can be turned on and off for each instrument, can be auto-set to on and off whenever you create a new instrument. E.G.: You open Silk with the automation display automatically set to on. You change the settings in the project to set it to off. Then you open Spray without the automation display.
Alternatively, you can set each automation setting on or off to display multiple automations, or simply use a selection screen to select the automation displayed, like this:
